website_summaries.verdict: The women’s UGG Bren is a great casual pair for everyday use. It’s superb cushioning provides long-lasting comfort and support and is perfect for all-day walking. This pair can pass as a summer shoe for its superior breathability and comfort. It’s stylish and versatile and easy to wear with anything.
pros: A number of fans love the fit of the UGG Bren that’s equally great even without wearing socks
A lot of reviewers attest to the superb cushioning and support of the UGG Bren
Numerous wearers claim that the pair does not give discomfort when worn for long hours and is perfect for standing and walking all day
A user comments that it’s a really comfortable sneaker that’s ready to wear right out of the box and doesn’t need breaking in
Many reviewers claim that the Bren sneaker from UGG is well made and durable
Most wearers say that it’s very breathable and great at keeping the feet cool and dry and that it’s perfect for a summer shoe
Numerous users love the casual design and style of the sneakers that go easily any outfit
Quite a lot of reviewers say that they would definitely recommend the pair to family and friends
cons: A reviewer mentions that the shoes stain easily
Some reviewers say that it’s slightly wider than usual

customer_reviews.title: The worst product ever.
customer_reviews.text: They were dirty, with hair on it. They don't look original.
customer_reviews.author: lourdes

customer_reviews.title: slip on casual shoe
customer_reviews.text: I got these shoes for a recent trip to Europe. I wanted an easy slip on slip off shoe w/out laces to get through security easier. These shoes worked out great. Security was a breeze and although this shoe has little arch support, they were actually comfortable. While at the airport, I did wear little socks with them. Although they looked dorky with socks, I didn't want bare feet at the TSA check point or on the plane. But while in the cities, I wore these with no socks and they were breathable and comfortable. I walked a lot throughout the European cities comfortably. I do wish darker colors were available also.
customer_reviews.author: EvaMartha

customer_reviews.title: Too large
customer_reviews.text: I love that these are lightweight comfortable, and the look is right on. They run large. I’ve bought countless Uggs, always a size 7, these are too loose. Sadly, they are being returned
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too bad
customer_reviews.text: They're really cute but they don't stay on your feet which is kind of their only job. I sized down and they still come off my heal as I walk. I wouldn't even say it's a sizing problem. There is no structure to keep the sides and back from collapsing in under your feet while you walk.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: These are really cute and so surprisingly comfortable. I usually have so much trouble with shoes fitting me well due to bunions but the fit was perfect and effortless. Look great with long summery skirts and dresses and cropped pants/leggings. I am usually a 6 1/2 but went with the 6 and they are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful. I bought a 9 and they were a little too big so sent them back for an 81/2 which fit perfect. I normally wear a 9 so I feel they run just a bit large. I love that they’re comfortable and cute.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best comfy shoes!! And super cute.
customer_reviews.text: My favorite shoes ever!! Literally slip on and super comfy. They don't give a lot of arch support if you need that but for me they are perfect. I can even fit in my custom orthotics.
customer_reviews.author: Juliette

customer_reviews.title: Sent back
customer_reviews.text: I sent these back because I wanted a thicker shoe for cold months, but this would be a good spring shoe. I could see the material not lasting though. Very very thin. I wouldn’t buy them now for that reason. Fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: fits great, comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe for me as a teacher who is on her feet all day. I had no problem inserting my othotic inserts and these shoes still fit well. Uppers are stretchy, sole flexible. I am a big fan of the Uggs shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth C. Kopack

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are so comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: While vacationing in Orlando I tried these shoes on at Macy's however, they did not have my size. I checked at UGG; no luck. Finally, I was able to order them on Amazon. I am so happy that I kept searching for them because they are so comfortable and I can walk in them all day long!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I love all and have many pairs in this style of UGG shoes but this one I was disappointed in the fabric of the shoe. It was a lovely color but seemed to be a light weight fabric I am not sure will hold up to all the others do. But I am keeping it.
customer_reviews.author: MJR

customer_reviews.title: I Love these slip on shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. I wear a size 7 but had to return my original pair for a 6 1/2. I own the blue and the black pair. They are very comfortable. I can’t say enough about these UGG slip on shoes. The white around the sides clean up easy with a damp rag also.
customer_reviews.author: Donna O'Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. This is my second pair. They do run a bit large, so I ordered a half size down. Perfect fit, comfortable shoes that you can wear all day.
customer_reviews.author: L. M. Oakes

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable summer shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love the fit. The color is spot on. I’m wearing them everyday. I should get another pair before the season is over because I’ll run these to the ground. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Dolly A

customer_reviews.title: ok sneaker-runs 1/2 size small
customer_reviews.text: Run small be careful. Not a must have in my opinion. Looks better in the picture than it does in real life.
customer_reviews.author: candace scott

customer_reviews.title: Cute shoes
customer_reviews.text: I’m on my feet all day in a classroom and I’ve had foot surgery years ago. These shoes provide enough support for me to wear them comfortably all day. Be sure to wear those little ballet socks.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Kimbrough

customer_reviews.title: great fit and confort
customer_reviews.text: I just love my shoes; they are comfortable and look great with my sundresses
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and cute!
customer_reviews.text: Other than being a little larger than my normal size, these are great. Comfy and cute.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Love these —they run a little big!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! I had to go down 1/2 size and they fit perfectly! They are light and comfy and are a fresh addition to my warm weather clothes.
customer_reviews.author: cocochanel20

customer_reviews.title: SO CUTE!!  SO comfortable!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I already have the coral Bren's which I loved so I decided on these cute blue Bren's. I will be buying more before summer is over.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Cardella

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes/sneakers. So comfortable with good support & cute
customer_reviews.author: Anne Marie F

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Material is good but it was a lil bit large.
customer_reviews.author: Diep

customer_reviews.title: ordered two and didn't like color
customer_reviews.text: very comfortable but didn't like color..pink was not the pink i wanted
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: Feels cheaply made. Runs very small and narrow, could not get my usual size on my foot at all.
customer_reviews.author: C. Clark

customer_reviews.title: BEST COMMUTER SHOE, EVER
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes - stylist and comfortable. They are a commuter's holy grail. Not to mention, they're super convenient to take the dog out for a walk! I will buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Comfy, soft and light weight. Not really recommended for winter wear. But for all other seasons -perfect
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Askew

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute Shoes
customer_reviews.text: OMG....I love these shoes. The fit is perfect and the style is amazing, I love the color. I wear a 9 in womens and that is what I ordered....perfect fit
customer_reviews.author: Bon Bon

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Fits very well, comfort is A-1! I can wear these all day and my feet aren't tired!
customer_reviews.author: Taryn

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Found the bone color in a dept. store and really like them. I found other colors and bought them! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. The color, comfort and the price. They're perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Maas

product_meta.title: UGG Women's Bren Sneaker
product_meta.description: This classic slip-on is updated with lightweight mesh and a plush terrycloth interior.
feature_bullets: EVA performance foam insole with canvas lining
